page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName serves as a container for [item name=pattern_drive]. Each storage houses 6 [item name=pattern_drive]. It's the only way to store item patters and make them available to other machines trough the matter network. The [block name=replicator] for example, requires the $itemName to acquire patterns for replication.

page.title: How to use
page.text: Connect the $itemName to a Matter Network using [block name=network_pipe] trough the back. Machines like the [block name=matter_analyzer] or [block name=replicator] will try to find the first available $itemName. The [block name=pattern_monitor] will show patterns stored in each [item name=pattern_drive] of the $itemName.
